p_63: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).

p_99: This is a four-year training program with a simple goal: create a welcoming environment where our residents will thrive and become exceptional radiologists. Our program offers residents learning opportunities through participation in high-quality clinical practice as well as instruction by the faculty in regularly scheduled conferences and didactic lectures.
